title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: White and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Three shields (two under crowns and the third incomplete) showing a castle, a coat of arms ad a rampant animal, probably a lion.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, 18th century.
18th century. White and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-47.
